frontmatter.title: JS-103 | Declarations & Statements
frontmatter.description: JavaScript applications consist of statements with an appropriate syntax. A single statement may span multiple lines. Multiple statements may occur on a single line if each statement is separated by a semicolon. This isn't a keyword, but a group of keywords...
